text: Sammy Solitaire Siddharta Skytte (born 20 February 1997) is a Danish footballer who plays as a midfielder for Norwegian club Stabæk. ==Youth career== Skytte started playing football at Silkeborg KFUM at the age of 8, before signing a youth contract in 2012 with Silkeborg IF. ==Club career== ===Silkeborg IF=== Skytte is a product of Silkeborg IF and has played for the club since he was a kid. Skytte signed his first senior contract 12 August 2015, at the age of 18, after sitting on the bench for the first team in a game against Lyngby BK. Skytte got his debut for Silkeborg IF on 22 September 2015. Though his young age, he played 5 matches in the rest of the season in the Danish 1st Division. Skytte suffered from a shoulder injury in May 2016 and went through an operation, that kept him out for the rest of the season. From the summer 2016, Skytte started to play on full-time with the rest of the squad, after completing his school. His contract got extended in December 2016 until 2019.Silkeborg forlænger med Skytte‚ bold.dk, 10 December 2016 This extension emphasized his important role on the team. ===FC Midtjylland=== FC Midtjylland announced the signing of Skytte on a five-year contract, on 13 June 2018. Skytte was immediately loaned out to AC Horsens. Silkeborg IF later revealed, that FCM had triggered his purchase clause that was set to 3.7 million danish krone. On 8 July 2019, Skytte was loaned out to Norwegian club Stabæk Fotball.SAMMY SKYTTE KLAR FOR STABÆK, stabak.no, 8 July 2019 ===Bodø/Glimt=== Without making a single appearance for Midtjylland, the club confirmed on 25 February 2020, that Skytte had signed a 5-year contract with Norwegian club FK Bodø/Glimt.FC MIDTJYLLAND SÆLGER SAMMY SKYTTE TIL NORSK TOPKLUB, fcm.dk, 25 February 2020 ===Return to Stabæk=== On 11 September 2020, Skytte returned to Stabæk, which he played for on loan in 2019. Skytte signed a contract until the end of 2023.SAMMY ER TILBAKE: - DET ER ET KJÆRLIGHETSFORHOLD, stabak.no, 11 September 2020 ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:
